```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# create image folder ----
if (!file.exists("figs/")) {
    dir.create("figs/")
}
# create data folder ----
if (!file.exists("data/")) {
    dir.create("data/")
}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
    echo = TRUE, # show all code
    tidy = FALSE, # cleaner code printing
    size = "small",
    fig.path = "figs/") # smaller code
knitr::opts_knit$set(
    width = 78)
base::options(tibble.print_max = 25,
              tibble.width = 78)
```
